subject: Question about Assignment 2
body: Hi Professor, I'm having trouble with the responsive design part of the portfolio website. Could you provide a hint?

subject: Re: Question about Assignment 2
body: Of course. Take a look at the CSS Flexbox resources I posted in the course materials. That should point you in the right direction.

subject: Database Project - Team Formation
body: Hey Sara, do you want to team up for the Database Design Project?

subject: Re: Database Project - Team Formation
body: Yeah, that sounds great! Let's connect after class tomorrow to discuss ideas.

subject: Office Hours Request
body: Professor Chapman, would it be possible to schedule a brief meeting to go over my feedback on the Linked List assignment? Thanks, David.
